COMMENT_TX: replay,1,hollm001,NYA,laynj901,STP01,,N,M,NYA,C $when Matt Holliday was called out at 1B, Yankees manager Joe Girardi challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay

replay,2,smitm007,TBA,laynj901,STP01,,N,M,TBA,A replay,2,smitm007,TBA,laynj901,STP01,,N,M,TBA,P $when Steven Souza was called out at HP, Rays manager Kevin Cash challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay; the catcher was ruled not to have blocked HP by replay

originally scored as SH, changed on 04-07 to fielder's choice error

ej,kierk001,P,muchm901,Called third strike Rays center fielder Kevin Kiermaier ejected by HP umpire Mike Muchlinski

replay,7,collt002,DET,vanol901,STP01,,N,M,TBA,E replay,7,collt002,DET,vanol901,STP01,,N,M,TBA,C $when Tyler Collins was called safe at 1B, Rays manager Kevin Cash challenged the slide at 2B, by Justin Upton; the call was upheld by replay saying it was a legal slide; Upton's wrist collided with Tim Beckham's wrist and Upton was injured; Cash also challenged the call at 1B, which was upheld by replay

replay,6,jonej006,DET,vanol901,STP01,,N,M,DET,C $Evan Longoria allowed the popped-up bunt to drop to the ground to start the double play; when JaCoby Jones was called out at 1B, Tigers manager Brad Ausmus challenged the ruling; the call was upheld by replay
ej,cashk001,M,vanol901,Checked swing Rays Manager Kevin Cash ejected by HP umpire Larry Vanover

ej,pillk001,P,fairc901,Arguing balls and strikes $After grounding out, Pillar jogged back to dugout and as he passed home plate, he said quietly to plate umpire Fairchild that the called strike on the first pitch 'was terrible'; Fairchild ejected him
